name: Avatour Technologies Inc.
description: Developer of remote collaboration platform designed to conduct remote inspections, training, and other site-specific meetings. The company's software allows users to share a real place where they can see the entire environment and interact with each other, enabling remote users to effectively participate in site meetings and save time and money.
one_liner: Developer of remote collaboration platform designed to conduct remote inspections, training, and other site-specific meetings.
